  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>

          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>mats_469</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">El globo terráqueo</string>
            <string language="en">The globe</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Kugel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le globe</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O globo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il globo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η σφαίρα</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">unidad didáctica que desarrolla mediante simulaciones la geometría esférica aplicada al conocimiento del globo terráqueo. Se estudian coordenadas, distancias y superficies en el globo terráqueo.</string>
            <string language="en">teaching unit which uses simulations to study spherical geometry applied to our knowledge of the terrestrial globe. It studies coordinates, distances and surfaces on the globe.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">distancias</string>
            <string language="en">distances</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">esfera</string>
            <string language="en">sphere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">geometría</string>
            <string language="en">geometry</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">coordenadas</string>
            <string language="en">coordinates</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">globo terráqueo</string>
            <string language="en">globe</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unterrichtende Maßeinheit, welche 
Gebrauchsimulationen, kugelförmige Geometrie zu studieren an unserem 
Wissen der terrestrischen Kugel anwendete. Es studiert 
Koordinaten, Abstände und Oberflächen auf der Kugel.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">unité d'enseignement quelles simulations 
d'utilisations étudier la géométrie sphérique s'est appliquées à
notre connaissance du globe terrestre. Il étudie des 
coordonnées, des distances et des surfaces sur le globe.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">unidade ensinando que simulações dos usos 
estudar a geometria esférica aplicou a nosso conhecimento do globo 
terrestrial. Estuda coordenadas, distâncias e superfícies no 
globo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">unità d'istruzione quali simulazioni di usi 
studiare la geometria sferica ha applicato a nostra conoscenza del 
globo terrestre. Studia le coordinate, le distanze e le 
superfici sul globo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">η μονάδα διδασκαλίας που χρησιμοποιεί τις 
προσομοιώσεις στη σφαιρική γεωμετρία μελέτης ίσχυσε απο ό,τι 
ξέρουμε της επίγειας σφαίρας. Μελετά τις συντεταγμένες, τις
αποστάσεις και τις επιφάνειες στη σφαίρα.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Abstände</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
